name: European Holiday Home Association
goal: The purpose of the European Holiday Home Association is to give voice to the holiday home industry and secure a balanced discussion in the tourism debate. The EHHA represents national trade associations and companies within the holiday home rental sector in Europe.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Culture, Employment and Social Affairs, Enlargement, Enterprise, External Relations, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport, Youth
euInitiatives:
Package Travel Directive
European Tourism Quality Label
European Tourism
Sharing Economy Regulation
Digital Single Market
Collaborative Economy
Short Term Rental
